CN.content:

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Polymer solar cells (PSCs)
2. donor materials
3. acceptor materials

These are the materials that are being referred to or discussed in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

2. donor materials
3. acceptor materials

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer solar cells (PSCs) |
| donor materials |
| acceptor materials |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) - This is a property value that refers to the percentage of incoming sunlight that is converted into electrical energy by the solar cell.
2. Donor materials - These are materials that donate electrons during the solar cell's operation, and their property value is related to their ability to absorb light and generate charge.
3. Acceptor materials - These are materials that accept electrons during the solar cell's operation, and their property value is related to their ability to absorb charge and generate voltage.
4. Device engineering - This is a property value that refers to the design and optimization of the solar cell's structure and architecture, which can affect its efficiency and performance.
5. Fabrication processes - These are the methods used to manufacture the solar cell, and their property value is related to the quality and consistency of the final product.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties:

1. Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) - This is a property value that refers to the percentage of incoming sunlight that is converted into electrical energy by the solar cell.
2. Material properties - This is a general term that refers to the physical and chemical properties of a material, including its structure, composition, and other characteristics that determine its behavior and performance.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |
| Material properties |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
